short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store the words with urls for your further revision

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can translate the highlighted text on any webpage by right-clicking. Then the extension automatically translates and stores the vocabulary for your future revision.
